name: Mirage (itch) (waguu07)
description:
When you can see it, it doesn't exist. When you can't, it exists.

This is a puzzle platformer where blocks can only be stepped on when it isn't visible.  Memorize where the blocks are, tread carefully, and be wary that the block can be only switched when nothing is blocking it.

Jump: X

Turn blocks on/off : Z

Restart : R

Sources used:

Coyote Jump Tutorial

Spinning Object Tutorial

Sound Effect : jsfxr
